name: Flumph
movement: 5 ft. on land, 30 ft. flying, 30 ft. swimming
description: The Flumph is a small, floating creature resembling a jellyfish with a bulbous body and tendril-like appendages underneath. It can emit and change the color of light and has a whimsical, non-threatening appearance.
memorable: Unique for its telepathic communication and ability to illuminate or conceal itself, the Flumph often plays a quirky, support role in adventures.
goals: The Flumph typically seeks to gather information and support its allies rather than engage in combat.
relations: Often encountered with other aberrations, particularly those that also utilize telepathy.
environment: Typically found in underground waterways or areas where it can access both air and water.
strengths: Good evasion capabilities due to high Dexterity and the ability to perceive telepathic messages.
weaknesses: Very low Strength makes it inept in physical confrontations, and it has a vulnerability to psychic damage.
attacks: Can make a melee attack with its tendrils, dealing piercing and acid damage. Also has a stench spray attack that poisons enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Stench Spray, which can incapacitate foes and poison them while affecting others nearby.
senses: The Flumph can perceive telepathic messages within 60 feet and is immune to effects that read its thoughts or emotions.
additional_information: Amphibious, able to breathe in both air and water.
Flumph Light ability allows it to illuminate and conceal itself.
Telepathic Spy feature grants immunity to divination effects pertaining to it.
Can become incapacitated if knocked prone but may right itself with a Dexterity saving throw.
Typically a non-combatant seeking to aid allies.
test_queries: floating creature that emits light and poisons enemies
small monster with tendrils and stench spray
